competitions.name: “上地UPSIDE”2024人工智能创新创业挑战赛（报名截止：11月15日）
competitions.description: 本赛事由海淀区上地街道党工委、办事处主办，旨在推动人工智能技术的创新应用，服务项目落地成长，支持并保障海淀区人工智能产业快速发展。通过AI Studio飞桨星河社区，深入发掘和培养优秀人工智能创业团队，诚邀全球范围内人工智能领域人才参赛！

competitions.name: 飞桨多模态大模型套件PaddleMIX开发大赛
competitions.description: 飞桨多模态大模型套件PaddleMIX整合了业界前沿的多模态大模型与飞桨框架底层高性能技术，全面兼顾高性能算法、便捷开发、高效训练和完备部署，其丰富的多模态模型库覆盖图像、文本、视频、音频模态模型。为完善百度飞桨多模态大模型套件PaddleMIX的数据分析和处理能力，参赛项目有机会将验证有效的数据处理方案合入企业实际产品中，包括数据分析和处理功能、单元测试适配、文档适配等，从而为千万用户降本增效。

competitions.name: 科学计算工具组件开发大赛
competitions.description: 为多个科学计算领域重点工具组件适配飞桨后端，完善飞桨框架工具组件生态，提高飞桨用户开发效率。

competitions.name: 星河产业应用创新奖-飞桨产业实践方向
competitions.description: ”星河产业应用创新奖-飞桨产业实践方向“面向工业制造、物流航运、医疗健康、生物医药等新质生产力重点领域，征集依托飞桨框架、飞桨开发套件解决产业问题的前沿方案和具备商业价值的生态 AI 产品。

competitions.name: 第二届全球AI药物研发算法大赛
competitions.description: 竞赛由清华大学药学院、百度飞桨、Intel共同发起，旨在借助百度飞桨螺旋桨在生物计算上的算法优势，通过AI Studio平台，探索AI+药学领域前沿技术，挖掘和培育人才，诚邀全球范围内生物计算领域人才参赛！

competitions.name: WWW2025 多模态对话系统意图识别挑战赛(赛季 1)
competitions.description: 在人工智能快速发展的背景下，如何高效地进行客户服务对话中多模态意图的识别成为了一个关键挑战。精准识别消费者在多次互动中的意图，不仅能显著提升客户体验和服务质量，还能助力企业的商业智能发展。为此，本次比赛由淘天集团、WWW2025、天池联合主办，设计了一个涵盖文本与图像涉及40余种不同类型的消费者图片场景以及意图分类任务数据集，旨在推动电商领域多模态对话场景意图识别技术的发展。

competitions.name: 2024 CXL（Compute Express Link）技术创新方案大赛(赛季 1)
competitions.description: 2024 CXL（Compute Express Link）技术创新方案大赛，是由CXL联盟联合Intel和阿里云发起的一项面向亚太地区的技术/产品/解决方案征集活动。旨在通过对技术/产品、解决方案、部署和应用实践，以及生态建设方面的优秀企业或组织的鼓励，从而推动CXL技术社区的成员的聚集、成果共享以及应用和实践的展示，最终吸引更多的数据中心领域相关厂商、用户和初创企业加入，推动CXL技术生态的繁荣。

competitions.name: 智源行业数据应用大模型挑战赛 ——医学数据赛道（开发者组）(赛季 1)
competitions.description: 为进一步推广行业数据集应用，智源研究院、魔搭社区、天池平台、中国互联网协会、AIIA联盟共同发起行业数据场景应用创新计划第二期 暨行业数据应用挑战赛，邀请企业技术团队和广大开发者共同参与，希望能够帮助更多行业高效地利用大模型的技术赋能生产力，产生更多的创新和行业应用，推动垂直行业的快速发展。

competitions.name: 智源行业数据应用大模型挑战赛 ——医学数据赛道（企业组）(赛季 1)
competitions.description: 为进一步推广行业数据集应用，智源研究院、魔搭社区、天池平台、中国互联网协会、AIIA联盟共同发起行业数据场景应用创新计划第二期 暨行业数据应用挑战赛，邀请企业技术团队和广大开发者共同参与，希望能够帮助更多行业高效地利用大模型的技术赋能生产力，产生更多的创新和行业应用，推动垂直行业的快速发展。

competitions.name: Inundata: Mapping Floods in South Africa
competitions.description: Can you identify where and when an urban flash flood happened in South Africa?

competitions.name: Ghana Crop Disease Detection Challenge
competitions.description: Can you build a model for mobile phones to identify diseases on tomatoes, corn, and peppers?

competitions.name: Kuyesera AI Disaster Damage and Displacement Challenge
competitions.description: Can you help communities recover by detecting damaged infrastructure using aerial imagery?

competitions.name: SUA Outsmarting Outbreaks Challenge
competitions.description: Can you turn the tide on waterborne diseases by predicting the next outbreak in Tanzania?

competitions.name: Telangana Crop Health Challenge
competitions.description: Can you predict the health status of crops?

competitions.name: African Credit Scoring Challenge
competitions.description: Can you predict the likelihood of a customer defaulting on a loan based on their financial data ?

competitions.name: AI/ML for 5G-Energy Consumption Modelling
competitions.description: Can you predict energy consumption of different 5G products?

competitions.name: Smart Energy Supply Scheduling for Green Telecom Challenge
competitions.description: Can you predict daily solar energy generation and create optimal strategies for utilizing these energy sources?

competitions.name: RMB CPI Nowcasting Challenge
competitions.description: Can you nowcast South African CPI?

competitions.name: Wadhwani AI Bollworm Counting Challenge
competitions.description: Can you  improve a pest control app by counting the number of bollworm moths per image?

competitions.name: Spatio-Temporal Beam-Level Traffic Forecasting Challenge
competitions.description: Can you forecast traffic throughput volumes within communication networks?

competitions.name: Traffic Jam: Predicting People's Movement into Nairobi
competitions.description: Uber and Mobiticket team up to predict demand for public transportation into Nairobi

competitions.name: Farm Pin Crop Detection Challenge
competitions.description: Classify fields in South Africa by crop type using Sentinel-2 satellite imagery

competitions.name: Uwazi Citizen Science Challenge
competitions.description: Can you collect data on African crops to contribute to the future of AI on the continent?

competitions.name: ITU Digital Financial Services Blockchain Secure Authentication Application Challenge
competitions.description: Can you build a passwordless authentication application?

competitions.name: Arm UNICEF Disaster Vulnerability Challenge
competitions.description: Can you identify thatch-roofed houses for disaster planning in rural Malawi using aerial images?

competitions.name: CGIAR Crop Damage Classification Challenge
competitions.description: Can you identify types of damage in cellphone images of crops?

competitions.name: CGIAR Eyes on the Ground Challenge
competitions.description: Can you predict drought damage from smartphone images of crops?

competitions.name: Digital Africa Plantation Counting Challenge
competitions.description: Can you create a semi-supervised algorithm to count trees in plantations in Côte d'Ivoire?

competitions.name: Africa Biomass Challenge
competitions.description: Can you predict biomass in cocoa plantations in Côte d'Ivoire?
